channel.title: Blog on Courtney Caldwell
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Courtney Caldwell

item.title: 20240531 - Work and Learning
item.description: Well, I didn’t post anything yesterday At least I didn’t post anything on this site. I got a lot of stuff fixed here on Wednesday, and got a decent amount of stuff out the door, but I didn’t really post too much. I did a couple things over on Mastodon. But here, nothing. But I wasn’t doing nothing. Docker, Kubernetes, and Networking So one of the things I was doing yesterday was learning all about the different ways you can network stuff in Docker.
